subject: Hiya, Kids, Hiya, Hiya
event:
I'll be back soon, I will, I will.

Watch this space.

comments.article: And so it begins :-) I'm going to guess that Melisandre and Brienne are up first, maybe to be followed by Davos and Stannis?
Brienne is dead.
Can't wait Mr. Martin.

I am so excited to find out the casting for this season! So many excellent roles to fill...

However this time around, I think I'll stay off the fan blogs entirely and see if I can't sleuth out the answers from hints myself. More fun that way. :D

I'm so excited to see who they've got as Davos! I know he's not a terribly popular character, or at least not anywhere near as popular as others, but he's one of my favorites in the series. I can't wait to see who they've got to make him as endearing on screen as he you made him in text! Haha.

I'm just as excited to see Brienne too. Hell, I can't wait to see all of them, really. <3 I'm surprised the casting is coming so soon, though. I guess I didn't realize production in season 2 was going to go forward that quickly.
Is it plunking time? Will you bring the Magic Twanger?
I am so in love with the casting this season... I can't WAIT to see who they manage to find for season 2. Oh, this will be fun...
Oh! Oh! What about Jaqen H'ghar??? *love*
I really cannot wait to see who you get for Melisandre. For some reason, even though she's not necessarily my favorite character, she is one of the few I have a very definite image in my head for.
Me too, and I couldn't believe when I saw a movie and immediately went OMG, it's Melisandre! http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0004787/ Saffron Burrows is my EXACT image of Melisandre.
Ah, I do love this part.  I hope you get the choices you want and are happy with all the actors! :) :)
comments.subject: So exciting!

comments.article: In Nina Gold We Trust!
comments.subject: Yay!

comments.article: Anyone else really want Henry Ian Cusick (Desmond from Lost) to play Davos? I'm going to freak out with nerd glee until the end of the series if this happens.

Holy crap, that's a great idea! I can totally Cusick as Davos when I think about him running around with that scruffy beard and long hair in season 3/4. Not to mention he's a great actor. Kudos to this idea!

comments.subject: Had to make an account just to reply to this!

comments.article: casting for s2! how exciting! do we meet asha greyjoy is s2? i hope she's awesome, i adore her. although i kind of want lily allen cast; i don't know if she can act, i think she and her brother together would be pretty funny. might make the groping scenes extra weird, tho.

Woohoo, the teasing begins again!  I'm most looking forward to seeing the residents of Dragonstone cast - Stannis, Davos, and of course Melisandre.  After reading through <u>Clash</u> and <u>Storm</u> again, I can't wait to see how those scenes play out on the show.  Stannis especially, as he's become one of my favorite characters to read - not a chance I'd want to have to deal with him in real life, but still.  Eh heh heh.

I am most excited for Melisandre and Ygritte. Those are two of my faves. Melisandre is so powerful..... and when she gave birth to that shadow.... lord I can't wait to see that on TV (not a spoiler I hope).

And Ygritte is just so awesome! You know nothing Jon Snow!
Dolorous Edd is my favorite character by far.  I hope the boss has him as a dragon rider doing his depressed Dangerfield shtick while burning armies.  Just planting ideas here.
comments.subject: Edd

comments.article: you watched Andy's gang too! ha! Froggy and his magic twanger.
comments.subject: Froggy

comments.article: Read Armageddon Rag -- boy, George is familar with Froggy and his magic twanger...
comments.subject: Re: Froggy

comments.article: I always had a younger Sean Connery type in my head for Davos.
I've seen this Froggy picture a lot here, it's becoming your Avatar to me. Some way in my mind it has connected with you so much that I actually think it looks like you...

I hope Stannis is a well established British actor. I like the nobles to be noble. From the scenes in S1 so far Emilia Clarke is not yet exuding any nobility for me. Her brother is I hope she changes rapidly as her story progresses.

Lily Allen as Asha is amusing and not such a bad idea.
Davos will be interesting as he has honour. Tyrion, Sandor and Ned have honour and there actors are doing them justice. I find honour is the coin that should be followed in these stories, it has more richness than gold.

Brienne will be the difficult choice. She HAS to be large and unnatractive.
I await the results with interest.

Mr M, what is the time lime for casting and the start of filming of S2?
For some reason, I've always thought of Patrick Stewart as Stannis.

Hello Mr. Martin, first time poster here. Thank you for all the thrills you've given us with ASOIAF and now the series; and also for your availability in bringing us news and answering our queries. There's so much I'd like to ask, but I'll stick to the burning question that obsesses many of us fans: Will the Blackfish be in S2? Please put our hearts at rest one way or the other, thank you!
comments.subject: The Blackfish

comments.article: Felicia Day for Asha Grey
comments.subject: Asha Greyjoy

comments.article: I realize this is the culture for a love of Felicia Day, but I can think of actresses far, far, far better suited to the role. Let's start with Queen Latifah and go from there.
comments.subject: Re: Asha Greyjoy

comments.article: In my opinion, the most difficult (and interesting) casting will be Brienne. They'll have to restrain the usual hollywood impulse to get a beautiful woman, or get a beautiful woman and make here slightly less-attactive with a pony-tail. :P
comments.subject: Casting season 2

comments.article: Nicole Bass. Let's do this!
comments.subject: Re: Casting season 2

comments.article: Richard Belzer for Jacelyn Bywater. That way sergeant John Munch, or his double, can make his appearance in YET another TV series, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Munch
comments.subject: A humble suggetion...

comments.article:
I'm so happy we get Margaery in the second season! :)
I love her.
I'm also super excited for Davos,Edd,Ygritte, Asha, and Brienne! :)
And I hope we get Tony Curran, or someone equally amazing, as Stannis! :)
Please tell us that Jaqen will be in season two!
Davos in my head has always been Robert Carlyle. And Christopher Eccleston for Stannis, but I'm sure he's too persnickety to sign on.

Want Jeremy Irons in the cast.
Don't care who.
Stannis or Davos would be nice.
Jeremy Irons is out of action for Season 2, due to THE BORGIAS being re-comissioned and the filming dates clashing, I believe.
